name: Crayon Friends!
description:
LOGLINE:
Classroom 13 is excited to make fun Halloween crafts out of the materials you provide them with, like crayons, clay, scissors, staplers, and f̷l̵e̸s̷h̵ !

SOME FRIENDLY, TEACHERLY, ADVICE:

  1. Don't give the children anything too dangerous. You wouldn't want them to hurt you themselves.
  2. It's advisable to use the bathroom before class. Once you're in, there are no potty breaks. 
  3. Don't worry about the time. You'll barely notice it passing by.

CONTENT WARNING: 

This game is not suited to those easily disturbed. Contains Blood, Gore, Violence, Auditory Scares, Mentions of Death & Shooting.

TEAM

  • Abhishek [Game Design]
  • Achal Mehrotra [Voice Acting]
  • Andrew Yorke [Programming]
  • Goutham Dindukurthi [Programming]
  • Jeslina Mary John [Art | Design]
  • Siri Kambalimath [Story | Art | Design]

This game was made in 2 weeks for the Spooktober 4th Annual Visual Novel Jam!

Note: This game is still under development and will receive updates in the future.
